amendatorysection.chaptername: Cities And Villages; Laws Applicable To All
amendatorysection.catchline: Building permit; duplicate; issued to county assessor; when.
amendatorysection.para: Any city or village which requires that a building permit be issued for the erection, alteration, or repair of any building within its corporate limits or extraterritorial zoning jurisdiction shall, if the improvement is two thousand five hundred dollars or more, issue a duplicate of such permit to the county assessor.
